item.title: 前端路线图

item.description: Front-end Internet How does the internet work？ What is HTTP? Browsers and how they work? DNS and how it works? What is Domain Name? What is hosting？ HTML Learn the basics Writing Semantic HTML Forms and Validations Conventions and Best Practices Accessibility SEO Basics CSS Learn the basic Making Layouts Floats Positioning Display Box Mode CSS Grid Flex Box

item.title: 如何学习前端
item.author: 小刘呀の博客
item.description: 兴趣是最好的老师 量变到质变：从基础开始，技术需要沉淀 总结和分享技术 对业务和对需求的思考，技术都是服务与业务的 行业同龄人比较，了解自己的不足 成
